byline.original: By BRIAN KNOWLTON and CHOE SANG-HUN
byline.contributor: Brian Knowlton reported from Washington, and Choe Sang-hun from Seoul, South Korea. Steven Lee Myers contributed reporting from Kabul, Afghanistan.

abstract: United States will resume exploratory nuclear talks with North Korea and has appointed Glyn Davies, American expert on nuclear issues, as special representative for North Korea policy.
snippet: The United States will resume stalled talks with North Korea and has appointed an envoy with a background in nuclear issues.
lead_paragraph: The United States will resume stalled talks with North Korea and has appointed an envoy with a background in nuclear issues.

headline.main: New U.S. Envoy to Talk With North Koreans
headline.print_headline: New U.S. Envoy and North Koreans to Meet in Possible Prelude to Nuclear Talks
headline.seo: New U.S. Envoy to Meet With North Koreans Next Week
